types.name: Gravelock Elder
types.desc: Other Gravelocks you control have +1 Health.
types.flavor: Gravelocks look up to their elders... literally.
rules: Ranged attack
This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

types.name: Gravelock Raider
types.flavor: You can handle one or two, but before you know it, they're everywhere.
rules: Relentless
When a Relentless unit destroys another unit, it keeps attacking with its remaining Attack value.

types.name: Infected Gravelock
types.desc: Infected Gravelock has [Move] 0.
types.flavor: "It's seeping out of their god-damn pores."\n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist
rules: Poisonous
When a creature attacks Infected Gravelock in melee combat, or is damaged by Infected Gravelock, that creature becomes poisoned.

types.name: Gravehawk
types.desc: Gravehawk gets +1 Attack for each Gravelock you control.
types.flavor: "Mom always said I'd end up in bad company. If she only knew..." \n- Ryssa, Gravehawk
rules: Relentless
When a Relentless unit destroys another unit, it keeps attacking with its remaining Attack value.

types.name: Elan Vital
types.flavor: Heal faster than you hurt and you'll keep fighting forever.
rules: Regeneration 1
Heals 1 each round, and removes poison.

types.name: Crown of Strength
types.desc: Enchanted unit gets +1 Attack and +2 Health.
types.flavor: The power of kings, imbued through discarded headwear.

types.name: Bear Paw
types.desc: Enchanted unit gets +2 Attack and +2 Health. When Bear Paw comes into play, enchanted unit's Countdown is increased by 1.
types.flavor: The gods saw fit to give it strong limbs and a mellow temperament.

types.name: Binding Root
types.desc: Enchanted unit's [Move] is decreased by 2.
types.flavor: There's no better ally than the ground beneath your enemies.

types.name: Hymn
types.desc: Target unit is fully [healed].
types.flavor: Music for those who can't dance.

types.name: Metempsychosis
types.desc: Target unit you control is resummoned on the same tile. Its Countdown is set to its previous value.
types.flavor: Consider the egg. The image of unfulfilled potential, and you eat them for breakfast...

types.name: Thought Trap
types.desc: Target unit's Countdown is doubled.
types.flavor: How far will a blind dog walk into a forest?

types.name: Rallying
types.desc: Units you control have their Countdown decreased by 2.
types.flavor: FOLLOW THE JARL FOR THE KIN!

types.name: Brother of the Wolf
types.desc: When Brother of the Wolf's Countdown is 0, you may increase Countdown by 2 to summon a\n<Ragged Wolf> on an adjacent tile.
types.flavor: Befriending wolves isn't hard. Failure, however, can be costly.

types.name: Callback
types.desc: Target unit you control is returned to your hand.
types.flavor: Everyone deserves a second chance.

types.name: Catapult of Goo
types.desc: Units attacked by Catapult of Goo have their Countdown increased by 2.
types.flavor: "I don't know if the piddlejacks are drivers or parasites on that infernal machine." \n- Ihrbraman, Creature Collector
rules: Lobber: 4 tiles
This unit targets certain tiles instead of attacking forward.

types.name: Thunder Surge
types.desc: Target unit and connected units are dealt 2 [magic damage].
types.flavor: Fear not the thunder. Fear the lightning.

types.name: Champion Ring
types.desc: Enchanted unit gets +2 Attack.
types.flavor: Hard to earn, even harder to carry.

types.name: Burn
types.desc: Deal 3 [magic damage] to target unit. If that unit is destroyed, draw 1 scroll.
types.flavor: "If you can't handle the fire, cool yourself in the kettle." \n- Old machine priest saying

types.name: Fertile Soil
types.desc: Sacrifice target creature you control and draw 3 scrolls.
types.flavor: The Kinfolk don't mourn their dead; nature doesn't waste life.

types.name: Death Cap Berserk
types.desc: When Death Cap Berserk comes into play, and at the beginning of its turns, enchanted creature's Countdown is decreased by 2 and it is dealt 1 [magic damage].
types.flavor: "I love music. Especially wardrums." \n- Harald, Berserker

types.name: Destroyer
types.flavor: About to dodge? It's too late!
rules: Lobber: 4 tiles
This unit targets certain tiles instead of attacking forward.

types.name: Druid Burial Ground
types.desc: At the beginning of your turn, adjacent units are [healed] by 1.
types.flavor: "I once saw two cats fighting next to such a monument. The fight lasted a week, then they starved to death."\n- Ihrbraman, Creature Collector

types.name: Quake
types.desc: Deal 3 [magic damage] to all structures and 2 [magic damage] to all creatures.
types.flavor: No matter your skill, you can't parry the ground.
rules: Taxing 2
When Quake is played, subsequent castings of Quake have their cost increased by 2.

types.name: Inferno Blast
types.desc: Deal 1 [magic damage] to target tile and adjacent tiles.
types.flavor: The power of ten men in one practical projectile.

types.name: Flip
types.desc: Move target opponent unit to another tile on the same side.
types.flavor: A shift in perspective isn't always a good thing.

types.name: Frost Wind
types.desc: Units on target tile and adjacent tiles have their Countdown increased by 1.
types.flavor: Packing an extra blanket is always good. Or five, if you're heading north.

types.name: Great Wolf
types.desc: Great Wolf gets +1 Attack for each other Wolf you control.
types.flavor: The beasts have legends too.
rules: Relentless
When a Relentless unit destroys another unit, it keeps attacking with its remaining Attack value.

types.name: Iron Ogre
types.flavor: Step aside or be disintegrated.
rules: Relentless
When a Relentless unit destroys another unit, it keeps attacking with its remaining Attack value.
Armor 1
Physical damage dealt to Iron Ogre is reduced by 1.

types.name: Junkyard
types.desc: Rats you control have +1 Attack and +1 Health.
types.flavor: Rats aren't picky.

types.name: Kinfolk Brave
types.flavor: Braves are eager to prove their worth. The Jarls are happy to let them.

types.name: Kinfolk Jarl
types.desc: Kinfolk Jarl has +1 Attack for each adjacent creature.
types.flavor: The strength of his people, crushing your people.
rules: Relentless
When a Relentless unit destroys another unit, it keeps attacking with its remaining Attack value.
Inspiring: +1 Attack
When Kinfolk Jarl comes into play, adjacent units have their Attack increased by +1 until end of turn.

types.name: Leeching Ring
types.desc: When enchanted creature deals damage, it is [healed] by 2.
types.flavor: Search the ponds. Find one and your name is eternal.

types.name: Mangy Wolf
types.desc: When Mangy Wolf comes into play, other Wolf creatures you control have their Countdown decreased by 1.
types.flavor: "The fat wolf is not dangerous."\n- Kinfolk proverb

types.name: Dryadic Power
types.desc: Enchanted creature gets +1 Attack and +3 Health, and its [Move] is decreased by 1.
types.flavor: The strength of a tree with the resolve of a rock.

types.name: Potion of Resistance
types.desc: For 3 rounds, damage dealt to enchanted unit is reduced to 1.
types.flavor: Sometimes you've just got to take the hit.

types.name: Pushback
types.desc: Target unit is returned to its owner's hand.
types.flavor: You know you're not wanted when your body dissolves.

types.name: Ragged Wolf
types.flavor: Fast and feisty.
rules: Haste
Creature comes in play with Countdown set to 0.

types.name: Kabonk
types.desc: Deal 1 [magic damage] to target unit. Draw 1 scroll.
types.flavor: Ouch!

types.name: Shrine
types.desc: Other units you control have +1 Health.
types.flavor: With a strong enough faith, you don't need gods for miracles.

types.name: Sinmarked Zealot
types.desc: When Countdown is 0, you may sacrifice Sinmarked Zealot to deal 2 [magic damage] to target unit.
types.flavor: When his time comes, so will yours.

types.name: Sister of the Fox
types.desc: When Sister of the Fox comes into play, draw 1 scroll.
types.flavor: The eyes and ears of the Jarl.

types.name: Royal Vanguard
types.desc: When Royal Vanguard's Countdown becomes 0, adjacent units get +2 Attack until end of turn.
types.flavor: Honor. Power. Axe.

types.name: Speed
types.desc: Target unit's Countdown is decreased by 3.
types.flavor: They won't know what hit them.

types.name: Essence Feast
types.desc: For each unit you control, [heal] your idol on the same row by 1. Beast creatures deal double damage to idols this turn.
types.flavor: Just like love, it can heal and hurt.

types.name: Pother
types.desc: Target unit is moved to a random adjacent tile. Draw 1 scroll.
types.flavor: Now you're there, now you're not!

types.name: Unleash Inner Power
types.desc: Target creature's Attack is increased by its Health value. Its Health is then set to 2.
types.flavor: My very essence shall be my blade.

types.name: Lifestealer
types.desc: When Lifestealer deals damage, it is [healed] by 2.
types.flavor: One day he'll pay for these borrowed lives.

types.name: Eternal Statue
types.flavor: It's said some sculptors infuse their work with a life of its own.
rules: Regeneration 1
Heals 1 each round, and removes poison.

types.name: Waking Stones
types.desc: All damage dealt to Waking Stones is reduced to 1.
types.flavor: "The problem with stone is that it is stationary. We fixed that."\n- Uria, Geo Mage

types.name: Transposition
types.desc: Switch places of two units you control. Draw 1 scroll.
types.flavor: You don't need powerful allies. You need allies in the right places.

types.name: Vitality Well
types.desc: When Vitality Well's Countdown becomes 0, units you control are [healed] by 1.
types.flavor: Refreshing!
rules: Haste
Creature comes in play with Countdown set to 0.

types.name: Blessing of Haste
types.desc: Target unit's Countdown is decreased by 1.
types.flavor: A little bit of speed can make all the difference.

types.name: Ancestral Totem
types.desc: Creatures you control have +1 Attack.
types.flavor: Kinfolk creations aren't always pleasant.

types.name: Copper Automaton
types.desc: Copper Automaton is destroyed after attacking.
types.flavor: Explosively cute.

types.name: Spark
types.desc: Deal 2 [magic damage] to target unit.
types.flavor: The smallest spark can cause a decent flame.

types.name: Cannon Automaton
types.flavor: wrrr wrrr clunk phssssht BwoooOOOM wrrr wrrr
rules: Ranged attack
This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).
Armor 1
Physical damage dealt to Cannon Automaton is reduced by 1.

types.name: Bitter Root
types.desc: When Bitter Root is attacked in [melee combat], the attacker becomes [poisoned].
types.flavor: "Sure, there's plenty to eat in the swamps. Shame it's all poisoned." \n- Gundar, Marsh Guide

types.name: Violent Dispersal
types.desc: Deal 8 [magic damage] to target unit.
types.flavor: "When he said 'Disperse!' I thought he meant all of us. Turns out he was only addressing poor Mikal." \n- Mahts, Infantryman\n

types.name: Focus
types.desc: Target creature gets +3 Attack until end of turn.
types.flavor: If it's worth killing, kill it good!

types.name: New Orders
types.desc: Your units have their [Move] increased by 1 until end of turn.
types.flavor: REGROUP!

types.name: Honorable General
types.desc: When Honorable General's Countdown becomes 0, adjacent units have their Countdown decreased by 2.
types.flavor: Time and again, he has brought victory. The Empire's reward is war.

types.name: Kinfolk Veteran
types.flavor: It's tough getting old in this business.
rules: Haste
Creature comes in play with Countdown set to 0.

types.name: Rumble
types.desc: Each opponent unit is moved to a random adjacent tile.
types.flavor: Shaken, not crushed.

types.name: Fury
types.desc: All units have their Countdown decreased by 1.
types.flavor: Fanning the flames of battle.

types.name: Crimson Bull
types.desc: Units you control get +2 Attack until end of turn.
types.flavor: Drink, and take flight!

types.name: Machine Priest
types.desc: Machine Priest does not attack. Structures and Automatons you control have +1 Attack.
types.flavor: Deep within the mountainous assembly halls, the Litany Mechanica is sung day and night.

types.name: Ember Bonds
types.desc: Enchanted unit is dealt 2 [magic damage] before attacking.
types.flavor: It's inevitable.

types.name: End of Reason
types.desc: Sacrifice all units you control with a non-zero Countdown. Each unit sacrificed this way deals 2 [magic damage] to opponent units on the same row.
types.flavor: "You served me well as soldiers. Now serve me as projectiles!"\n- Arran, Machine Priest

types.name: Ether Pump
types.desc: When Ether Pump attacks, opponent's units are dealt 1 [physical damage].
types.flavor: "I know what it looks like! Trust me. A few of these will win any siege." \n- Arran, Machine Priest

types.name: Golem Skin
types.desc: When Golem Skin comes into play, enchanted creature gains Attack and Health equal to the number of structures you control. Structures you control take 2 [magic damage].
types.flavor: When you wear machines, laundry day is your greatest worry.

types.name: Frost Gale
types.desc: Deal 1 [magic damage] to all units.
types.flavor: Bad weather is a great weapon. If only you could aim it.

types.name: Magma Pack
types.desc: When Magma Pack comes into play, enchanted unit's Attack is doubled. Enchanted unit is destroyed after attacking.
types.flavor: Don't worry, just push the button when you arrive.

types.name: Plate Armor
types.desc: Enchanted unit gets +1 Health.
types.flavor: "If only we had enough for everyone..."\n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist
rules: Armor 1
Physical damage dealt to enchanted unit is reduced by ${AMOUNT}.

types.name: Tick Bomb
types.desc: Destroy target structure.
types.flavor: Sounds like tick, looks like tick.

types.name: Vitriol Aura
types.desc: When enchanted creature deals damage to another creature, that creature becomes [poisoned].
types.flavor: Try not to breathe.

types.name: Eye of Eagle
types.desc: Draw 1 creature scroll.
types.flavor: Strategy is nothing if you're blind.

types.name: Proximity Charge
types.desc: When destroyed in [melee combat], attacking unit is dealt 4 [physical damage]. When Proximity Charge comes into play, a copy is summoned adjacent to it.
types.flavor: Tread lightly!

types.name: Frostbeard
types.desc: When Frostbeard is destroyed in combat, units you control get +2 Attack until end of your next turn.
types.flavor: An honorable death is not to be mourned; it's a blessing.

types.name: Heritage
types.desc: When enchanted unit you control is destroyed, draw 2 scrolls.
types.flavor: "This way your life, or death, won't be a complete waste." \n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist

types.name: Faith Blessing
types.desc: Target unit you control takes 2 [magic damage]. Your idol on that row is healed by 4.
types.flavor: "It's an immense honor. Be grateful for it." \n- Pater Brecht

types.name: Nutrition
types.desc: Sacrifice target unit you control and add that unit's cost to your [current] resources.
types.flavor: A cadaver for some, a feast for others.

types.name: Powerbound
types.desc: When enchanted unit you control is destroyed, increase Order by 1.
types.flavor: "I'll just borrow some life force when you don't need it anymore."\n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist

types.name: Gun Automaton
types.flavor: A special kind of turtle.
rules: Ranged attack
This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

types.name: Vengeance Veil
types.desc: When enchanted unit takes damage, its Countdown is decreased by 1.
types.flavor: All is blood from behind the crimson veil.
rules: Replenish
When Vengeance Veil is played, your current Wild is increased equal to the cost of Vengeance Veil.

types.name: Useless Contraption
types.flavor: Working as intended.

types.name: Purification
types.desc: Remove all enchantments and [effects] from target unit.
types.flavor: The innocence of youth can cleanse the corrupt.

types.name: Ranger's Bane
types.desc: Enchanted creature becomes [poisoned].
types.flavor: You haven't really died until you've been slowly strangled by poisonous roots.

types.name: Horn of Ages
types.desc: Opponent units have their [Move] decreased by 1 until end of their turn.
types.flavor: You're thankful for surviving battles past, until you crumble under the weight of the memories.

types.name: Mire Curse
types.desc: Mire Curse deals 1 [poison damage] to adjacent creatures at the beginning of each of its turns.
types.flavor: It's putrid, but it's home.

types.name: Faith Chains
types.desc: When enchanted creature is destroyed, Faith Chains deals 1 damage to opponent idols.
types.flavor: "The chains weigh heavier on them, my son." \n- Pater Brecht

types.name: Bloodboil
types.desc: When enchanted unit takes damage, it gets +2 Attack.
types.flavor: AURRGH... YOU... I... KILL RAAAHH!!
rules: Replenish
When Bloodboil is played, your current Wild is increased equal to the cost of Bloodboil.

types.name: Summons
types.desc: Draw 1 structure scroll.
types.flavor: "We need more stuff!" \n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist

types.name: Scattergunner
types.flavor: "He was carrying WHAT?!"\n- Mahts, Infantryman
rules: Ranged attack
This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

types.name: Law Memorial
types.desc: When Law Memorial's Countdown becomes 0, it's destroyed and Order is increased by 1.
types.flavor: You'd think a people so fond of writing would remember the words of their ancestors.

types.name: Desert Memorial
types.desc: When Desert Memorial is destroyed, increase Energy by 1.
types.flavor: Breakers against the eroding waves of time.

types.name: Tribal Memorial
types.desc: Pay 2 Energy to destroy Tribal Memorial and increase Growth by 1.
types.flavor: Lest we forget the times of peace.

types.name: Woodland Memorial
types.desc: When you play a spell or enchantment, Woodland Memorial is destroyed. Increase Growth by 1.
types.flavor: The Kinfolk have forgotten, but the trees remember.

types.name: Sand Pact Memorial
types.desc: When Sand Pact Memorial comes into play, increase [current] Energy by 5.
types.flavor: Like grains of sand in an hourglass, our memories fade over time.

types.name: Stone Pact Memorial
types.desc: When Stone Pact Memorial comes into play, increase Order by 1.
types.flavor: We remember the times, but not the promises.

types.name: Illthorn Seed
types.desc: When enchanted unit you control is destroyed, summon an <Illthorn> in its place.
types.flavor: This corpse brings its own flowers to the funeral.

types.name: Illthorn
types.flavor: "Look, Barbra. Wires!" \n- Ihrbraman, Creature Collector
rules: Spiky 1
When Illthorn is attacked in melee combat, Illthorn deals 1 physical damage to attacking unit.

types.name: Decimation
types.desc: Units on target row are dealt 1 [magic damage]. Opponent's idol on that row is dealt 2 damage.
types.flavor: One by one by one they fall, and now we've reached the Cobalt Hall...

types.name: God Hand
types.desc: Units you control get +2 Attack until end of turn, and have their Countdown decreased by 2.
types.flavor: Howl for the gods!

types.name: Hellspitter Mortar
types.desc: Attacks a randomly selected tile on opponent's board.
types.flavor: Aim? With enough power you don't need aim.
rules: Lobber: 1 tile
This unit targets certain tiles instead of attacking forward.

types.name: Knight Scholar
types.desc: When Knight Scholar's Countdown is 0, you may reset its Countdown to draw 1 scroll.
types.flavor: Knowledge is strength.

types.name: Obelisk
types.flavor: Good for leaning on. And hiding behind...

types.name: Ducal Infantryman
types.desc: Other creatures you control on the same row have +1 Attack.
types.flavor: Strength in numbers.

types.name: Ducal Skirmisher
types.flavor: Slice and dice!
rules: Relentless
When a Relentless unit destroys another unit, it keeps attacking with its remaining Attack value.

types.name: Ducal Spearman
types.flavor: If you bait them, they will come.
rules: Spiky 3
When Ducal Spearman is attacked in melee combat, Ducal Spearman deals 3 physical damage to attacking unit.

types.name: Resonant Helm
types.flavor: You'll hear the silent whispers of magic and it will change you.
rules: Magic resistance 1
Magic damage dealt to enchanted unit is reduced by 1.
Resonance: [Heal] 2
Resonance effects are triggered when you play a spell.

types.name: Crossbowman
types.flavor: Locked, loaded, and lying in wait...
rules: Ranged attack
This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

types.name: Royal Infantryman
types.desc: Other creatures you control on the same row have +1 Health.
types.flavor: Yes, my Liege. I'll protect them, my Liege.

types.name: Royal Skirmisher
types.flavor: Double the swords, double the fun!
rules: Relentless
When a Relentless unit destroys another unit, it keeps attacking with its remaining Attack value.

types.name: Royal Spearman
types.flavor: HOOOOOLLLD!
rules: Spiky 3
When Royal Spearman is attacked in melee combat, Royal Spearman deals 3 physical damage to attacking unit.

types.name: Bunny
types.desc: If Bunny's Attack is 0, it will summon another Bunny in an adjacent tile instead of attacking.
types.flavor: Cute, crafty, and quick to procreate.

types.name: Gravelock Outcast
types.desc: Pay 1 Growth to fully [heal] Gravelock Outcast.
types.flavor: "Cast out from gravelock society? Wow, that's some feat."\n- Siani, Dyrran Historian

types.name: Tethered Recruit
types.desc: When Tethered Recruit is destroyed, increase Order by 1.
types.flavor: "Its mind is muddled, but its heart is still with the army."\n- Arhart, Mire Master

types.name: Darkstrike
types.desc: Deal 2 [magic damage] to target unit. If that unit is destroyed, increase Decay by 1.
types.flavor: When darkness envelops, life abandons.

types.name: Efficiency
types.desc: Target unit gets +2 Attack until end of turn. If that unit destroys another unit this turn, increase Energy by 1.
types.flavor: The best discipline conserves energy.

types.name: Erode
types.desc: Target structure is dealt 2 [magic damage]. Increase Decay by 1.
types.flavor: From life, destruction. From ashes, life.

types.name: Return To Nature
types.desc: Creatures on target tile and adjacent tiles get -1 Health until end of turn. If a creature with this effect is destroyed, increase Growth by 1.
types.flavor: Wither and begin anew.

types.name: Blast Strike
types.desc: When enchanted creature deals damage, units adjacent to its target are dealt 1 [magic damage].
types.flavor: "Needs more brutal."\n- Arran, Machine Priest

types.name: Rigged
types.desc: When enchanted structure is destroyed in [melee combat], its attacker is dealt 4 [physical damage].
types.flavor: Strap it on, then stand back.
rules: Unstable 1
When Rigged is destroyed, it deals 1 damage to your opponent's idol on the same row.

types.name: Overdrive
types.desc: When Overdrive comes into play, and at the beginning of its turns, enchanted structure's Countdown is decreased by 2 and it is dealt 1 [magic damage].
types.flavor:
"I know it'll break. I just
don't care."
- Arran, Machine Priest

types.name: Plating
types.desc: Enchanted unit disregards next attack or damage taken. Plating is removed afterwards.
types.flavor: Almost works like real armor.
rules: Replenish
When Plating is played, your current Wild is increased equal to the cost of Plating.

types.name: Iron Whip
types.desc: Deal 1 [magic damage] to target unit. It gets +1 Attack until end of turn, and its Countdown is decreased by 1.
types.flavor: A whip for steel hides.

types.name: Incendiaries
types.desc: Deal 3 [magic damage] to all opponent structures.
types.flavor: It's raining cats and bombs.

types.name: Redesign
types.desc: Target creature's Attack and Health switch values.
types.flavor: "Trust me, it's better this way."\n-Amhan, Machine Master

types.name: Desperation
types.desc: Target creature gets +2 Attack until end of turn for each opponent unit on the same row. It is then dealt 1 [magic damage].
types.flavor: Many a conqueror have been surprised by the ferocity of desperate defenders.

types.name: Blind Rage
types.desc: Target creature deals [magic damage] equal to its Countdown to adjacent units. Its Countdown is then increased by 1.
types.flavor: When you're seeing red, friends and foes look the same.

types.name: Machination Mindset
types.desc: Enchanted melee creature gets [Relentless] and +1 Attack.
types.flavor: No doubt, no fear, no thought.

types.name: Concentrate Fire
types.desc: Target Ranged or Lobber unit makes an extra attack after its next attack.
types.flavor: Double the fire, double the fun.

types.name: Tool Initiate
types.desc: When Tool Initiate's Countdown is 0, you may increase its Countdown by 1 to give target structure +1 Attack.
types.flavor: "Let me just tweak this..."\n-Amhan, Machine Master

types.name: Metal Heart
types.desc: Target creature gains Attack equal to the number of structures on that side until end of turn.
types.flavor: More machines, more mayhem.

types.name: Bombard
types.desc: Ranged or Lobber units on target tile and adjacent tiles have their Countdown decreased by 2.
types.flavor: FIRE AT WILL!

types.name: Clock Library
types.desc: When Clock Library's Countdown becomes 0, it's destroyed and you draw 3 scrolls.
types.flavor: Tick. Tick. Tick. Tick...

types.name: Wildling
types.desc: When a creature comes into play adjacent to Wildling, Wildling is dealt 1 [pure damage] and gets +1 Attack.
types.flavor: Sometimes you just want to be left alone.

types.name: Mangonel
types.desc: When Mangonel comes into play, your Mangonels' Countdowns are\nset to the lowest of any you control.
types.flavor: Powerful, portable, and packing a punch.
rules: Lobber: 4 tiles
This unit targets certain tiles instead of attacking forward.

types.name: Vaettr of the Wild
types.desc: While Vaettr of the Wild is in play, Growth is increased by 1.
types.flavor: The forest personified. Cute.

types.name: Imperial Resources
types.desc: Draw 2 scrolls. Your idols are [healed] by 1. Increase Order by 1.
types.flavor: From the furthest reaches of the Empire, they hauled their gear. Now, the time has come to use it.

types.name: Divine Mark
types.desc: When enchanted creature is destroyed, it is returned to owner's hand. If it was destroyed by damage from another unit, that unit is returned to its owner's hand.
types.flavor: "Let's try that again."\n- Lord Ungstram, Royal Strategist

types.name: Unbind
types.desc: Destroy target enchanted unit.
types.flavor: What once was no longer is.

types.name: Charge Coil
types.desc: When Charge Coil attacks, a random opponent unit is dealt 1 [physical damage].
types.flavor: "This is extremely annoying."\n- Arhart, Mire Master

types.name: Viscera Sage
types.desc: When Viscera Sage destroys another unit, draw 1 scroll.
types.flavor: Reading entrails takes a strong stomach.

types.name: Loyal Darkling
types.desc: When Countdown is 0, you may sacrifice Loyal Darkling.
types.flavor: To night, she'll return.
rules: Unstable 2
When Loyal Darkling is destroyed, it deals 2 damage to your opponent's idol on the same row.

types.name: Husk
types.flavor: Hollow, haggard, happy to help.

types.name: Mire Shambler
types.desc: Before attacking, Mire Shambler moves to a random adjacent tile.
types.flavor: "From the depths of the mire, the Masked appeared." \n- Excerpt, Ilmire Journal II

types.name: Mangy Rat
types.flavor:
Tiny Merchants
Trader of Graves
Death's Servants
Fate's Knaves
rules: Poisonous
When a creature attacks Mangy Rat in melee combat, or is damaged by Mangy Rat, that creature becomes poisoned.

types.name: Ilmire Witch Doctor
types.desc: When a Human creature adjacent to Ilmire Witch Doctor is destroyed, a <Husk> is summoned in its place.
types.flavor: "I can't promise you eternal life, but I can keep you standing."
rules: Ranged attack
This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

types.name: Blightbearer
types.desc: Blightbearer takes 1 [poison damage] before attacking. When Blightbearer is destroyed, all creatures on the same row become [poisoned].
types.flavor: In this army, illness is no excuse.

types.name: Puppet Soldier
types.desc: When Puppet Soldier is destroyed in combat, all units on the same row are destroyed.
types.flavor: The soldier is false. The fear is not.

types.name: Pillar of Disease
types.desc: Opponent units on the same row have -1 Attack.
types.flavor: The Ilmire provides for its own.

types.name: Animovore
types.desc: Enchant unit you control. When a unit adjacent to enchanted unit is destroyed, enchanted unit is dealt 1 [pure damage] and you draw 1 scroll.
types.flavor: I'll take a piece of your mind, if you don't mind.

types.name: Harvester
types.desc: Does not count down. When a creature is destroyed, Harvester's Countdown is decreased by 1.
types.flavor: We've learnt to live, and die, with the Harvesters.
rules: Relentless
When a Relentless unit destroys another unit, it keeps attacking with its remaining Attack value.

types.name: Totem of Suffering
types.desc: When a creature you control is destroyed, the opposing idol on that row is dealt 1 damage.
types.flavor: Empathy can be a cruel thing.

types.name: Soul Scrounger
types.desc: When a creature is destroyed, enchanted unit's Countdown is decreased by 1.
types.flavor: Those who have fallen act through the living.

types.name: Grisly Graft
types.desc: Enchant creature you control. When Grisly Graft comes into play, sacrifice adjacent creatures. Enchanted creature gains Attack and Health equal to the number of creatures sacrificed.
types.flavor: Great needlework!

types.name: Arthritis
types.desc: Each time enchanted unit deals damage, it is dealt 1 [magic damage].
types.flavor: You're only as old as you feel.

types.name: Restless Bones
types.desc: Undead units you control get +2 Attack until end of turn, and their Countdown is decreased by 1.
types.flavor: "Angering the dead is no trivial task." \n- Grahm, Animator

types.name: Tempo Theft
types.desc: Two target units switch Countdown values.
types.flavor: No refund upon completed transaction.

types.name: Shroud of Unlife
types.desc: When Shroud of Unlife comes into play, enchanted creature becomes Undead. When enchanted creature is destroyed, a <Husk> is summoned in its place.
types.flavor: "You'll not find warmth in this garb." \n- Tobai, Bone Merchant

types.name: Damning Curse
types.desc: Destroy target creature. Units you control are dealt 1 [magic damage].
types.flavor: When someone else is paying, who cares about the price?
rules: Taxing 1
When Damning Curse is played, subsequent castings of Damning Curse have their cost increased by 1.

types.name: Languid
types.desc: Enchanted unit's Attack is decreased by 2. When Languid comes into play, draw 1 scroll.
types.flavor: Play nice!

types.name: Energy Siphon
types.desc: When Energy Siphon comes into play, increase [current] Energy by 3. Enchanted creature gets -1 Attack and -1 Health.
types.flavor: Resources are everywhere. It's just a matter of extraction.

types.name: Brain Lice
types.desc: Enchanted creature becomes [poisoned]. When it is destroyed, draw 1 scroll.
types.flavor: Scratch all you want. The itch is in your head.

types.name: Searing Shackles
types.desc: Enchanted unit deals 1 damage to the idol behind it at the end of each of its turns. When enchanted unit moves, it is dealt 2 [magic damage].
types.flavor: Death is the only escape.

types.name: Miasma Well
types.desc: When Miasma Well's Countdown becomes 0, a random opponent creature becomes poisoned.
types.flavor: DO NOT DRINK.

types.name: Pillar of Fatigue
types.desc: When a creature moves, its Countdown is increased by 1.
types.flavor: What good are tactics when your men can't lift their swords?

types.name: Infectious Blight
types.desc: When Infectious Blight comes into play, enchanted creature becomes [poisoned]. If it is destroyed by poison, a random creature on the same side gets Infectious Blight.
types.flavor: \nThe plague does\nnot discriminate.

types.name: Necrogeddon
types.desc: Sacrifice all creatures you control. Creatures sacrificed this way are replaced by <Husks> at Countdown 0.
types.flavor: "This won't do. Lets start over."\n- Nuru, Flesh-seamstress

types.name: Beast Rat
types.flavor: "Oh look how big they are compared to those in the city!"\n- Ihrbraman, Creature Collector

types.name: Soul Steal
types.desc: Destroy target creature with health 2 or less. Summon a <Mire Shambler> on a random tile on your side.
types.flavor: Ilmire mercy is worse than death.

types.name: Regeniture
types.desc: Enchanted unit gets +2 Health. When Regeniture comes into play, the idol behind it is dealt 1 damage.
types.flavor: Sometimes you can squeeze blood from a stone.

types.name: Draining Mist
types.desc: All opponent units with Countdown 1 or less have their Countdown increased by 2.
types.flavor: "Wait, I have an idea!"\n- Nuru, Flesh-seamstress

types.name: Roasted Bean Potion
types.desc: Target creature's Countdown is decreased by 1. Its [Move] is increased by 1 until end of turn.
types.flavor: It's an acquired taste. By the barrel from far Dyrra.

types.name: Oblivion Seeker
types.desc: When Oblivion Seeker is destroyed, draw 2 scrolls.
types.flavor: He leaves nothing but memories.
rules: Ranged attack
This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

types.name: Ilmire Rot Eater
types.desc: When a creature adjacent to Ilmire Rot Eater is destroyed, Ilmire Rot Eater gets +1 Attack and +1 Health.
types.flavor: Corpses are surprisingly nutritious.

types.name: Ilmire Hunter
types.flavor: Like the mire, Hunters kill without mercy.
rules: Slayer
When Ilmire Hunter deals damage to a creature, that creature is destroyed.

types.name: Scavenger Construct
types.desc: When an adjacent unit is destroyed, Scavenger Construct gets +2 Health.
types.flavor: "Feed the Construct!"\n- Nuru, Flesh-seamstress

types.name: Atrophy
types.desc: Target unit's Attack is set to 0 until end of opponent's next turn. It cannot be increased during this time.
types.flavor: It usually takes longer.

types.name: Cluster Hex
types.desc: All units on target tile and adjacent tiles get [Curse] 2.
types.flavor: Curse upon you, and your children, and their children for seven generations.

types.name: Cursemonger
types.desc: When Cursemonger's Countdown is 0, you may reset its Countdown to give target unit [Curse] 2.
types.flavor: "Needles and bones, my darling, that's my trade."
rules: Ranged attack
This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

types.name: Pestis
types.desc: Enchanted creature has +1 Attack for each Rat on that side. When enchanted creature destroys another unit, summon a <Mangy Rat> on a random tile the same side.
types.flavor: There's no virtue among vermin.

types.name: Hex Marks
types.flavor: It's not just about looks.
rules: Idol strike 3
When enchanted creature deals damage to an idol during combat, that idol is dealt an additional 3 damage.

types.name: Noaidi
types.flavor: For the Kinfolk, the moose migration marks the beginning of the new year.
rules: Replenish
When Noaidi is played, your current Wild is increased equal to the cost of Noaidi.

types.name: Solemn Giant
types.desc: Does not count down. Pay 2 Energy to decrease Countdown by 2.
types.flavor: "The Giants are no more, so we made new ones."\n-Amhan, Machine Master\n

types.name: Dust Runner
types.desc: When Dust Runner deals damage to a creature with 3 or less Health, that creature is destroyed.
types.flavor: "Kinfolk make for great\ntarget practice."\n- Sarh, Dust Runner
rules: Ranged attack
This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

types.name: Wings Shield
types.desc: Wings Shield has [Armor] equal to the number of units behind it.
types.flavor: "I shield those I love. From them I draw strength."

types.name: Automata Forge
types.desc: Instead of attacking, Automata Forge summons a <Gun Automaton>\non an adjacent tile. Pay 3 Energy to decrease Countdown by 1.
types.flavor: Kadum... pssht!

types.name: Stag Heart
types.desc: Enchanted unit gets +1 Attack and +1 Health for each Stag Heart on the same side.
types.flavor: The Kinfolk judge every beast on their own merits.

types.name: Faith Duty
types.desc: Enchant unit you control. At the end of each of its turns, enchanted unit is dealt 1 [pure damage], and opponent units on that row get their Countdown increased by 1.
types.flavor: Willingly, but not wisely.

types.name: Metal Wonder
types.desc: When your opponent plays a spell or enchantment, Metal Wonder deals 2 damage to a random idol they control.
types.flavor: Machine victory, no fiddly bits.

types.name: Crone
types.desc: Crone does not attack. When Crone is destroyed in combat, the attacking unit is destroyed.
types.flavor: "Grandma in the front. The hag's time is up."\n- Halm, Berserker

types.name: Breaker
types.desc: When Breaker deals damage, it gets +1 Attack.
types.flavor: Where Breakers go,\nonly twigs remain.

types.name: Oak Blood
types.desc: Enchanted creature gets +6 Health.
types.flavor: Trading with Vilewood trees is never a bargain.

types.name: Fierce Tactics
types.desc: Your melee creatures become [Relentless] until end of turn.
types.flavor: "They have the weapons, but we have the will!"\n- Halm, Berserker

types.name: Rat King
types.desc: Target tile and adjacent tiles. Summon three <Beast Rats> within the spell's area.
types.flavor: Obey the Jarl, but fear the King.

types.name: Appurtenance
types.desc: Enchanted unit gets +1 Health for each Beast you control.
types.flavor: They have their leaders, nature has hers.
rules: Replenish
When Appurtenance is played, your current Wild is increased equal to the cost of Appurtenance.

types.name: Berserker
types.desc: When Berserker takes damage, Berserker's gets +1 Attack.
types.flavor: "No. We only fight for Kav."\n- Halm, Berserker.
rules: Regeneration 1
Heals 1 each round, and removes poison.

types.name: Sister of the Bear
types.flavor: "Honored Sisters. Your strength will be my hammer against the hated Empire!"\n- Jarl Urhald

types.name: Kinfolk Ranger
types.flavor: Many of the ghost stories told about the deeper woods can probably be attributed to the stealthy rangers.

types.name: Owl
types.flavor: Hoot. Hoot?
rules: Flying
Owl can move to any tile. If that tile is not adjacent to Owl, its Countdown is increased by 1.

types.name: Sister of the Owl
types.desc: An <Owl> is summoned together with Sister of the Owl. When an Owl deals damage, Sister of the Owl gets +1 Attack.
types.flavor: Knowing and nocturnal.

types.name: Storm Runner
types.flavor: Storm Runners have perfected the art of... throwing.
rules: Lobber: 4 tiles
This unit targets certain tiles instead of attacking forward.

types.name: State Machine
types.desc: When a creature comes into play on opponent's side, State Machine deals 1 [magic damage] to that creature. When State Machine's Countdown becomes 0, it's destroyed.
types.flavor: Originally intended to roast beans.

types.name: Supercharged
types.desc: At the beginning of each of enchanted unit's turns, enchanted unit makes a ranged attack dealing 1 [physical damage].
types.flavor: It's not like they know how it works, exactly... but it's certainly useful.

types.name: Machine Chant
types.desc: Deal [magic damage] to target unit equal to the number of structures you control. Increase Energy by 1.
types.flavor: "It's an odd song for sure. Just wait for the crescendo!" \n- Arran, Machine Priest

types.name: Scout Automaton
types.desc: Other Automatons you control have +1 Attack.
types.flavor: No machine is complete without its smallest gears.
rules: Ranged attack
This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).
Armor 1
Physical damage dealt to Scout Automaton is reduced by 1.

types.name: Magnetizer
types.desc: Any unit hit by Magnetizer gets its Countdown increased by 1.
types.flavor: Power is relative. A sleeping enemy is a harmless enemy.
rules: Ranged attack
This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

types.name: Mystic Altar
types.desc: When Countdown is 0, you may reset its Countdown and increase Countdown of target creature you control by 2 to draw 1 scroll.
types.flavor: Learning takes time.

types.name: Redeploy
types.desc: Swap two target rows on your side.
types.flavor: "Wings to the east, vanguard south. Go!"

types.name: Caller's Bane
types.desc: When enchanted unit deals damage to an idol during combat, other idols on that side are dealt 1 damage.
types.flavor: Each idol is strongly linked to its Caller.

types.name: Aging Knight
types.desc: Each time Aging Knight attacks, its [base Countdown] is increased by 1.
types.flavor: The last thing a warrior learns is patience.

types.name: Royal Banner
types.desc: All non-Human units get Countdown increased by 2 after attacking.
types.flavor: Where the banner goes, the Empire soon follows.

types.name: Fleetness
types.desc: Enchanted unit's [base Countdown] is decreased by 1.
types.flavor: Faster is better than Stronger.

types.name: Machinated
types.desc: Enchanted creature gets +5 Attack, and its [base Countdown] is doubled.
types.flavor: Man shall become metal.

types.name: Corrode
types.desc: Units deal double damage to idols until end of turn. If a unit destroys an idol this turn, draw 1 scroll.
types.flavor: Even the Machines know heresy.

types.name: Wings Soldier
types.flavor: The elites of the Empire strike with precision.

types.name: Vigor Extraction
types.desc: Target unit's Countdown is increased by 2. If Countdown is then 4 or more, increase Decay by 1.
types.flavor: The life of another, put to better use.

types.name: Wicked Being
types.flavor: There are no innocents in the Mire.
rules: Unstable 2
When Wicked Being is destroyed, it deals 2 damage to your opponent's idol on the same row.

types.name: Refined Strategy
types.desc: Move target structure you control to another tile on that side. Its Countdown is decreased by 1.
types.flavor: "Perhaps we should move the catapults to the ridge?"

types.name: Siege Cracker
types.flavor: What do you mean, "bombs for hands"?
rules: Idol strike 5
When Siege Cracker deals damage to an idol during combat, that idol is dealt an additional 5 damage.

types.name: Ripper
types.flavor: "I was taught to be ready!"

types.name: Unforeseen Onslaught
types.desc: Creatures you control with Attack 1 or less get [Slayer] until end of turn.
types.flavor: 'Tis just a scratch.

types.name: Ilmire Tribesman
types.flavor: Fighting for their kin, alive or dead.

types.name: Pest Dissimulator
types.desc: When Pest Dissimulator deals damage to a creature, that creature and adjacent creatures become [poisoned].
types.flavor: Don't try and find me.
rules: Ranged attack
This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

types.name: Monstrous Brood
types.desc: Creatures you control with the same name as target creature are sacrificed, and each replaced by a <Monstrosity>.
types.flavor: A second birth. A new life. More teeth.

types.name: Monstrosity
types.desc: Monstrosity gets +1 Attack for each adjacent Monstrosity, and -1 Attack for other adjacent creatures.
types.flavor: Twisted. Transformed. Terrifying.

types.name: Fungify
types.desc: Enchanted creature gets +5 Health, and its [base Countdown] is increased by 1.
types.flavor: "Nightmarish stuff,\nbut damn, it works." \n- Isurd, Scryer

types.name: Ire And Bile
types.desc: All units get [Curse] 1 and +1 Attack until end of opponent's turn.
types.flavor: A conflict is easier to start than it is to end.

types.name: Sickening Fumes
types.desc: Until end of opponent's turn, opponent units have their attack decreased by 3.
types.flavor: It's not weather. It's miasma density.

types.name: Uneasy Alliance
types.desc: Enchanted creature gets +2 Attack. When it is destroyed, all other creatures with Uneasy Alliance are destroyed.
types.flavor: This won't end well.

types.name: Bloodline Taint
types.desc: Target unit, and other units on the same side that share a subtype, get [Curse] 1.
types.flavor: A cruel legacy.

types.name: Watcher
types.desc: When a unit adjacent to Watcher is destroyed by non-combat damage or death effects, Watcher deals 2 damage to a random opponent idol.
types.flavor: The Harvester's wrath lingers even after death.

types.name: Wings Captain
types.desc: When Wings Captain's Countdown becomes 0, Wings Captain and adjacent Soldiers have their [Move] increased by 1 until end of turn.
types.flavor: "Flanking maneuver!"\n- Ays, Wings Captain

types.name: Eager Scryer
types.desc: If Eager Scryer's Countdown is 2 or more at the end of your turn, draw 1 scroll.
types.flavor: "I deal in confusion. I buy it from you, and sell it to your enemy."\n- Isurd, Scryer

types.name: Cannonetta
types.flavor: "T- the bullet went through clean. I'll be fine."\n- Aru, now deceased
rules: Piercing
When a Piercing unit damages a unit, half of the damage (rounded down) is also dealt to the unit/idol behind it.
Ranged attack
This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

types.name: Untainted
types.desc: Enchanted unit has [Ward].
types.flavor: Those who do not want can not be corrupted.

types.name: Machine Divinator
types.desc: Machine Divinator does not attack. Structures you control have +1 Health. When Machine Divinator's Countdown becomes 0, a [random] structure you control has its Countdown decreased by 1.

types.name: Beetle Stone
types.desc: When another Beetle Stone comes into play, 2 damage is dealt to a random opponent idol. Beetle Stone is then placed at the top of your library.
types.flavor: The beetles were extremely popular once.

types.name: Eclipse
types.desc: All your [current] resources are converted into Decay.
types.flavor: "And then, all over the realm, it was dark..."

types.name: Ancestral Pact
types.desc: When a unit you control is destroyed during your opponent's turn, draw 1 scroll, and Ancestral Pact counts down by 1.
types.flavor: We fear no death.
rules: Linger: 4
This spell remains in play for 4 turns after being played.  If the same spell is cast again while it lingers, its duration is added to the remaining.

types.name: Piercing Projectile
types.desc: Enchanted ranged creature gets [Piercing] and +1 Attack.
types.flavor: "With these, you'll get through the strongest armor."\n- Arran, Machine Priest

types.name: Stifled Advance
types.desc: Enchanted unit's [base Countdown] is increased by 2. When Stifled Advance comes into play, enchanted unit's Countdown is increased by 2.
types.flavor: "They can't attack us if they're busy dodging arrows."

types.name: Blightseed
types.desc: Target creature you control has its Countdown increased by 2. If it is still on the board at the beginning of your next turn, draw 2 scrolls and increase [current] Decay by 2.
types.flavor: \n"Take two of these and come see me tomorrow."\n- Yon, Witch Doctor

types.name: Morbid Curiosity
types.desc: When enchanted creature destroys another creature, enchanted unit's owner draws 1 scroll.
types.flavor: "Show me your organs, and I will tell you who you were."

types.name: Stitcher
types.desc: When Stitcher's Countdown is 0, you may sacrifice target creature to give another target creature +2 Attack and +2 Health. If you do, Stitcher's Countdown is reset.

types.name: Arhart's Disciple
types.desc: When Arhart's Disciple deals damage to a unit, opponent's idol on the same row is dealt 1 damage.
types.flavor: "Fresh canvas! She'll be pleased."

types.name: Blade Husk
types.flavor: Created to kill without remorse.
rules: Dominion: [Relentless]
Dominion effects are active as long as at least one opponent idol is down.

types.name: Bog Hound
types.flavor: Playing fetch is far more interesting when there are multiple limbs to choose from.
rules: Dominion: +3 Attack
Dominion effects are active as long as at least one opponent idol is down.

types.name: Festering Freak
types.flavor: Sometimes, the Masked get it wrong.
rules: Poisonous
When a creature attacks Festering Freak in melee combat, or is damaged by Festering Freak, that creature becomes poisoned.

types.name: Corpus Collector
types.desc: When Corpus Collector destroys a creature, summon a <Husk> with 2 Countdown on an adjacent tile.
types.flavor: "Alas, this one's no good. Not enough arms."\n- Orren, Corpus Collector

types.name: Baleful Witch
types.desc: When Baleful Witch comes into play, any [Curses] on creatures in play are [triggered].
types.flavor: Her power is drawn from the purest spite.
rules: Ranged attack
This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

types.name: Soldier's Bond
types.desc: When enchanted unit takes damage, units behind it have their Countdown decreased by 1.
types.flavor: One for all. All for naught.
rules: Replenish
When Soldier's Bond is played, your current Wild is increased equal to the cost of Soldier's Bond.

types.name: Pilgrim's Feet
types.desc: When enchanted creature moves, it is [healed] by 2.
types.flavor: "I don't need shoes. I have faith."

types.name: Reversal
types.desc: Frontmost and rearmost units on one side of target row switch places. Draw 1 scroll.
types.flavor: "The right tool for the right job. And you tools are in the wrong place!"

types.name: Cursed Presence
types.desc: Target unit gets [Curse] 3.
types.flavor: "The nearby plants withered, and the birds fell silent. No one dared approach."

types.name: Fulmination Conduit
types.desc: Fulmination Conduit counts up instead of down at the beginning of its turn. You may sacrifice it to add its Countdown to your [current] Energy.

types.name: Nuru, Flesh-seamstress
types.desc: Nuru does not attack. When Nuru's Countdown becomes 0, summon 2 <Husks> with Countdown 0 at random positions. The Husks are destroyed after attacking.
rules: Unique
Summoning a Unique destroys previous Uniques with the same name.
Dominion: Undead creatures you control get +2 Attack.
Dominion effects are active as long as at least one opponent idol is down.

types.name: Malevolent Gaze
types.desc: Target creature's [Move] is decreased by 2 until end of its turn. It gets [Curse] 2.
types.flavor: Malice, pure and unguarded.

types.name: Gallant Defender
types.desc: As long as you have no more units than your opponent, Gallant Defender has [Armor] 2.
types.flavor: "Hold the walls! Protect your own!"\n- Cay, Royal Envoy

types.name: Hired Smuggler
types.flavor: "Got your parts, ahyup."
rules: Ranged attack
This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).
Pillage: Draw 1 structure scroll.
The pillage effect is triggered when this unit deals damage to an idol during combat.

types.name: Power Trip
types.desc: Increase [current] Energy by 6. If it is then 11 or more, draw 1 scroll.
types.flavor: "We need more."\n"But-"\n"MORE!"

types.name: Ash Runner
types.flavor: Looks are important to runners. To some, more than others.
rules: Piercing
When a Piercing unit damages a unit, half of the damage (rounded down) is also dealt to the unit/idol behind it.
Ranged attack
This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

types.name: Echomaton
types.desc: When an opponent plays a spell, Echomaton gets +2 Attack. When Echomaton is destroyed, if Attack is 3 or more, increase Energy by 1.
types.flavor: The perfect pet for a priest.

types.name: Boom Reaver
types.flavor: "Why's he carrying a ship's cannon?"\n- Ihrbraman, Creature Collector
rules: Ranged attack
This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

types.name: Ironclad Reaver
types.flavor: "I've always liked brawling. It's my favorite game."\n- Reaver Khaplan
rules: Pillage: Immune to damage until the beginning of your next turn
The pillage effect is triggered when this unit deals damage to an idol during combat.

types.name: Replicaton
types.desc: When Replicaton is destroyed, return to owner's hand if your [current] Energy is 2 or more.
types.flavor: You only need one. Of course, use more if you've got them.
rules: Ranged attack
This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

types.name: Sudden Eruption
types.flavor: "Too frequent by far, and utterly horrifying."\n- Siani, Dyrran Historian
rules: Surge: 2 [magic damage] to X random opponent units.
When this spell is cast, all remaining resources of its type are spent. The surge value (X) is equal to the amount spent.

types.name: Outcast Rebel
types.flavor: Ill-tempered and bad-mannered. No wonder the braves love him.

types.name: Culling the Flock
types.desc: Sacrifice target Beast. Other Beasts you control have their Attack increased by that unit's Attack until end of turn, and become fully [healed].
types.flavor: The laws of beasts are harsh.

types.name: Earthen Testament
types.desc: Enchanted units you control have their Countdown decreased by 2.
types.flavor: Few can best the Kinfolk on their own soil.

types.name: Vengeful Vaettr
types.flavor: Not so cute anymore.
rules: Pillage: Increase Growth by 1. Vengeful Vaettr is dealt 1 [pure damage].
The pillage effect is triggered when this unit deals damage to an idol during combat.

types.name: Bountiful Times
types.desc: Summon a <Bunny> on target tile. Other Bunnies have their Countdown decreased by 2.
types.flavor: "But... there were only a handful yesterday!"

types.name: Verdant Veil
types.desc: Enchanted creature gets +3 Health. As long as its Health is no less than its [base Health], it has [Ward].
types.flavor: "I swear! I saw a person in there!"

types.name: Underdog's Spite
types.desc: Creatures you control with Attack 2 or less have their Countdown decreased by 1.
types.flavor: As they dragged him out of the forest, the dagger was still lodged in his shoulder.

types.name: Wetland Ranger
types.flavor: With Ilmire warring against the Empire, the rangers were put to use where needed.
rules: Pillage: Your units get +1 Attack during your and your opponent's next turns.
The pillage effect is triggered when this unit deals damage to an idol during combat.

types.name: Jarl Urhald
types.flavor: All Jarls inspire loyalty and courage. Urhald lives it,\nbreathes it.
rules: Unique
Summoning a Unique destroys previous Uniques with the same name.
Relentless
When a Relentless unit destroys another unit, it keeps attacking with its remaining Attack value.
Inspiring: +2 Attack
When Urhald comes into play, adjacent units have their Attack increased by +2 until end of turn.

types.flavor: "Deep within the mire, the very air churned with a malice I cannot explain."\n- Frysk, Imperial Scout

types.name: Expedition Guard
types.desc: Expedition Guard has +1 Attack for each non-Human creature your opponent controls.
types.flavor: "Don't worry. I'll keep any assailants at bay."\n- Garthe, Expedition Guard

types.name: Stirring Effigy
types.flavor: The Empire's greatest never truly die.
rules: Resonance: A random adjacent creature gets +1 Attack.
Resonance effects are triggered when you play a spell.

types.name: Just Conviction
types.desc: Soldiers you control have +1 Attack.
types.flavor: "My soldiers know what's mine. That's what I like about them."\n- Queen-Empress Caera
rules: Linger: 5
This spell remains in play for 5 turns after being played.  If the same spell is cast again while it lingers, its duration is added to the remaining.

types.name: Resonant Sword
types.flavor: Think of it as a tuning fork, only sharper.
rules: Resonance: +2 Attack until end of turn.
Resonance effects are triggered when you play a spell.

types.name: Favored
types.desc: Enchanted unit gets +2 Health.
types.flavor: After years on the Arren Cape, Cay came to Southport. She stayed but a day, then left with a\nloyal army.
rules: Dominion: Enchanted unit's Attack is increased by 5.
Dominion effects are active as long as at least one opponent idol is down.

types.name: Pickaxe Volunteer
types.flavor: Many hands make light work.
rules: Idol strike 4
When Pickaxe Volunteer deals damage to an idol during combat, that idol is dealt an additional 4 damage.

types.name: Magma Thrower
types.desc: Magma Thrower's Attack is increased by your [current] Energy resource.
types.flavor: If a problem can't be solved with a gallon of molten rock, it's not worth solving.

types.name: Blast Automaton
types.desc: When Blast Automaton damages an opponent unit in combat, adjacent units are dealt 1 [physical damage].
types.flavor: \nNobody knows for sure, but\nsome say each houses a tiny Piddlejack. It's probably nonsense.
rules: Ranged attack
This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).
Armor 2
Physical damage dealt to Blast Automaton is reduced by 2.

types.name: Ka Zum Driller
types.flavor:
"It's made to take on
mountains. Magical rocks
are nothing, really."
- Krys, from Ka Zum
rules: Pillage: The damaged idol is destroyed.
The pillage effect is triggered when this unit deals damage to an idol during combat.

types.name: Assault Battery
types.flavor: "Hit them hard. Harder! More! Boom!"\n- Enryk, Machine Maker
rules: Ranged attack
This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).
Surge: X other [random] structures you control have their Countdown decreased by 2.
When this unit is played, all remaining resources of its type are spent. The surge value (X) is equal to the amount spent.

types.name: Excogitator
types.desc: Instead of attacking, Excogitator summons a <Scout Automaton> on an adjacent tile. Pay 3 Energy to decrease Countdown by 1.
rules: Unique
Summoning a Unique destroys previous Uniques with the same name.

types.name: Controlled Lightning
types.desc: Target unit you control makes a ranged attack, dealing damage equal to its Countdown.
types.flavor: When they least expect it... that's when lightning strikes.

types.name: Wind-up Automaton
types.desc: Wind-up counts up instead of down at the beginning of its turn. Pay 3 Energy to increase Attack by Countdown until end of turn. Countdown is set to 0.
rules: Ranged attack
This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

types.name: Steelwood Dedication
types.desc: If a creature you control is dealt damage during combat, it is then healed by 3.
types.flavor: Show no fear. The earth will tend to your wounds.
rules: Linger: 5
This spell remains in play for 5 turns after being played.  If the same spell is cast again while it lingers, its duration is added to the remaining.

types.name: Raid
types.desc: Any [Pillage] traits on units you control are activated.
types.flavor: "Find the stores! Hungry soldiers won't last long in Khaile."

types.name: Verdant Remnant
types.desc: When Verdant Remnant's Countdown becomes 0, draw 1 creature scroll.
types.flavor: On the northernmost tip of Reason's End, remnants of a distant past litter the wind-beaten landscape.
rules: Haste
Creature comes in play with Countdown set to 0.

types.name: Consolidator Niara
types.desc: When you play a creature scroll with a subtype not on your side, creatures you control get +2 Attack until end of turn.
types.flavor: \nThe Consolidator alone can\nsummon the Jarls to council.
rules: Unique
Summoning a Unique destroys previous Uniques with the same name.
Relentless
When a Relentless unit destroys another unit, it keeps attacking with its remaining Attack value.

types.name: Spotted Lynx
types.desc: When an opponent creature comes into play, Spotted Lynx's Countdown is decreased by 1.
types.flavor: "The lynx is a remarkable creature. Its pounce is unmatched by anything roaming these woods."\n- Maans, Forest Keeper

types.name: Overgrown Menhir
types.desc: When a creature comes into play next to Overgrown Menhir, that creature's Countdown is decreased by 1.
types.flavor: These stones are more than just symbols. They're the voice of Khaile.

types.name: Extractor Device
types.flavor: "This is absolutely awesome! It's... great!"\n- Owin, Machine Operator
rules: Pillage: Increase Energy by 1.
The pillage effect is triggered when this unit deals damage to an idol during combat.

types.name: Stone Recluse
types.flavor: "Each day's a trial. I tackle them in solitude."\n- Jehb, Khaile recluse
rules: Pillage: +2 Attack and relentless until next attack.
The pillage effect is triggered when this unit deals damage to an idol during combat.

types.name: Potency Burst
types.flavor: "I don't do subtle."\n- Enryk, Machine Maker
rules: Surge: Deal X [magic damage] to target unit.
When this spell is cast, all remaining resources of its type are spent. The surge value (X) is equal to the amount spent.

types.name: Keen Warden
types.flavor: "We're one with this forest - the birds, the bunnies and the snakes."\n- Poy Pohi, Grove Warden
rules: Pillage: +3 Attack until next attack.
The pillage effect is triggered when this unit deals damage to an idol during combat.

types.name: Orz Disruptor
types.desc: When a Human you control deals damage to a unit, opponent's idol on that row is dealt 2 damage.
types.flavor: The university's all about magic. The disruptors work as a safeguard, should things\ngo wrong.

types.name: Imperial Scepter
types.flavor: On the verge of collapse, the city of Ochre brought to the battlefield the Imperial Scepter. In its shadow, the battle turned.
rules: Unique
Summoning a Unique destroys previous Uniques with the same name.
Resonance: Adjacent units have their Countdown decreased by 1.
Resonance effects are triggered when you play a spell.

types.name: Expurgator
types.desc: When Expurgator comes into play, any enchantments on its row are destroyed.
types.flavor: There was a crackle in the air as the torch purged the air of miasmic dust. There could be no neglect, lest the entire convoy were to fungify.

types.name: Pack Fowl
types.flavor: "The burden of Arom makes life easier for the rest of us. It's truly a blessing."\n- Niem, about his pack fowl
rules: Dominion: While Pack Fowl is in play, Wild is increased by 2.
Dominion effects are active as long as at least one opponent idol is down.

types.name: Aes Moran Scholar
types.desc: When Aes Moran Scholar comes into play, [sift] 3 scrolls from your library, and draw 1 of them.
types.flavor: "I think about these things, you know? Scrolls and such."\n- Jahk Ob, Aes Moran Scholar
rules: Ranged attack
This unit is unaffected by effects that apply only to melee units (for example Spiky).

types.name: Oppressor's Rule
types.desc: Units on one side of a row have their Move decreased by 1 until end of their turn. Any attached enchantments are destroyed.
types.flavor: Imperial law follows the Empire's expansion. Sometimes, it even precedes it.

types.name: Keeper's Pledge
types.desc: When a creature comes into play, other creatures on that side get +1 Attack until end of turn.
types.flavor:
“Jarl, it is not my duty to
fight for you, just to honor
the Pledge.”
- Aer Lindr, Earthborn Keeper
rules: Linger: 4
This spell remains in play for 4 turns after being played.  If the same spell is cast again while it lingers, its duration is added to the remaining.

types.name: Border Treaty
types.desc: Non-Order Human creatures you control have +2 Attack.
types.flavor: Although mostly short-lived, a succession of treaties followed the end of the rebellion. It's as yet unclear who stands to gain the most from them.
rules: Linger: 6
This spell remains in play for 6 turns after being played.  If the same spell is cast again while it lingers, its duration is added to the remaining.

types.name: Hunter's Treaty
types.desc: If you control creatures from multiple factions, creatures you control have +2 Attack.
types.flavor: Sometimes, kinship reaches further than family.
rules: Linger: 3
This spell remains in play for 3 turns after being played.  If the same spell is cast again while it lingers, its duration is added to the remaining.

types.name: Reaver's Treaty
types.desc: Units you control with [Pillage] or [Dominion] have +1 Attack.
types.flavor: The combined might of the reavers and the Mudo finally forced the Empire to withdraw. The rebellion was over; merely a waypoint in history.
rules: Linger: 8
This spell remains in play for 8 turns after being played.  If the same spell is cast again while it lingers, its duration is added to the remaining.

armor: Armor reduces physical damage by the Armor value.
base attack: A unit's base Attack is the Attack value printed on the scroll.
base countdown: When a unit's Countdown resets after having reached 0, it counts up to its base Countdown. The default is printed on the scroll.
base health: A unit's base Health is the Health value printed on the scroll.
bunny: Creature, 0/3/1. Can spawn Bunnies instead of attacking.
current: Current resources are the remaining resources for this turn.
curse: Curse increases physical and poison damage by the Curse value.
dominion: Dominion traits are scroll-specific rules that are active only when at least one opponent idol is down.
echomaton: Creature, 1/2/3. Sometimes gives Energy when destroyed.
effects: Temporary effects that changes a unit's stats or rules, but don't count as enchantments.
haste: Creature with Haste come in play with Countdown set to 0.
heal: Healing increases a unit's current Health and removes any poison. Healing cannot increase a unit's Health above it's maximum.
healed: Healing increases a unit's current Health and removes any poison. Healing cannot increase a unit's Health above it's maximum.
heals: Healing increases a unit's current Health and removes any poison. Healing cannot increase a unit's Health above it's maximum.
lingering: Lingering spells give effects that last several turns.
magic damage: Magic damage is reduced by Magic resistance, but ignores Armor and Curse.
magic resistance: Magic resistance reduces magic damage by the Magic resistance value.
melee combat: Any attack that is not a ranged attack.
monstrosity: Creature, 3/2/3. +1 Attack per adjacent Monstrosity, -1 from others.
move: Units can move a number of times per turn equal to its Move.
physical damage: Physical damage is reduced by Armor and increased by Curse, but ignores Magic resistance.
piercing: When a Piercing unit damages a unit, half of the damage (rounded down) is also dealt to the unit/idol behind it.
pillage: Pillage traits are scroll specific rules that activate only when a unit damages an idol.
poison damage: Poison damage is increased by Curse, but ignores Armor and Magic resistance.
poisoned: Poisoned units are dealt 1 damage at the beginning of each turn. Being healed removes the poison.
pure damage: Pure damage cannot be reduced or increased.
random: Units with non-zero Countdowns are prioritized when selecting which unit to count down.
relentless: When a Relentless unit destroys another unit, it keeps attacking with its remaining Attack value.
scout automaton: Creature, 1/2/3. Armor 1. Gives +1 Attack to other Automatons.
sift: When sifting, you are shown a number of scrolls and pick one of them. The remainder are shuffled back.
slayer: When a Slayer unit deals combat damage to a creature, that creature is destroyed.
spiky: When a Spiky unit is attacked in melee combat, it deals physical damage to attacking unit equal to the Spiky value.
triggered: Triggering a curse means dealing pure damage equal to the Curse value.
ward: Units with Ward cannot be targeted by opponent Spells or Enchantments.
